name: purge gas, rich in sodium nitrate to market for sodium nitrate, unrefined | sodium nitrate, unrefined | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/20083/documentation

This activity represents a renaming activity. The activity links purge gas, rich in sodium nitrate to sodium nitrate, unrefined. This activity allows to model the reuse of purge gas in the production of potassium nitrate, industrial grade.  

The activity starts with the input of purge gas, rich in nitrate.

The activity ends with the provision of sodium nitrate, unrefined.
category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2012:Manufacture of fertilizers and nitrogen compounds

exchanges.description: Sodium nitrate reaching a purity of about 50%. This sodium nitrate is used in the production of potassium nitrate or will be further procecced to higher purities. So, this product is not sold on the market.

flow.name: sodium nitrate, unrefined
flow.category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2012:Manufacture of fertilizers and nitrogen compounds

exchanges.description: By-product of the potassium nitrate agricultural grade production. This product is futher used for the potassium nitrate production, industrial grade.

flow.name: purge gas, rich in sodium nitrate

defaultProvider.name: market for purge gas, rich in sodium nitrate | purge gas, rich in sodium nitrate | Cutoff, U
defaultProvider.category: B:Mining and quarrying/08:Other mining and quarrying/089:Mining and quarrying n.e.c./0891:Mining of chemical and fertilizer minerals
